body.p: When the Board restarted its work on the Conceptual Framework project in 2012, it did not reconsider Chapter 1 fundamentally (see paragraph BC0.11). Although some respondents to the 2013 Discussion Paper agreed with this approach, many stated that the Board should reconsider one or more aspects of Chapter 1.
